Text: Is it just to copy the content of the plugin folder to the nero folder?
Where do you put these files?

Put on the same dir in have installed Aac.dll, Aiff.dll, NeMP3Enc.dll ... replace all dlls.

 Use the windows search to find this folder
For Nero version 6, unzip the plugin DLL into "\Program Files\Common Files\Ahead\AudioPlugins" directory.
